alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 23 at 2:35AM CDT until August 23 at 7:49PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... East Fork Trinity River Near Crandall affecting Ellis, Dallas and Kaufman Counties. For the East Fork Trinity River...including Crandall...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork Trinity River Near Crandall. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Minor out of banks flooding is expected. Caution should be exercised near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 18.9 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 1.5 feet early Sunday morning. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
